data.lyric:
[ti:Dangerous]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Dangerous - Morgan Wallen
[00:03.43]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:06.87]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:10.30]I could see me sittin' in the back of a cop car
[00:12.59]Bangin' my head on a window
[00:14.37]I could see me slammin' that last call shot glass
[00:16.63]Losin' everything in my billfold
[00:18.22]Ooh ooh
[00:20.29]That's what I do when I'm drinking 'bout you ooh-ooh ooh
[00:25.57]So I don't want to go downtown
[00:28.77]Doin' what we used to
[00:30.66]Twist the top off another round hell I got enough loose screws
[00:34.61]I'm gettin' tired of hurting 'bout you
[00:36.84]Nothin' ever changes
[00:38.57]I think I'm gonna stay right here tonight
[00:40.77]'Cause that could be dangerous
[00:44.84]'Cause that could be dangerous
[00:50.02]Yeah I could see me doin' just fine with a daisy duke dime
[00:53.20]But I don't see it lastin' long
[00:54.79]I could see me orderin' too many drinks at the bar
[00:57.19]Get the bartender pouring 'em strong
[01:00.75]That's what I do when I'm tryin' to drink you gone
[01:05.95]So I don't want to go downtown
[01:09.06]Doin' what we used to
[01:10.91]Twist the top off another round hell I got enough loose screws
[01:15.02]I'm gettin' tired of hurting 'bout you
[01:17.12]Nothin' ever changes
[01:18.94]I think I'm gonna stay right here tonight
[01:21.10]'Cause that could be dangerous
[01:25.11]'Cause that could be dangerous
[01:30.29]Yeah 'cause you
[01:32.70]Got somebody else that you've been foolin'
[01:36.63]Them same tricks up your sleeve yeah
[01:39.18]Ooh ooh
[01:40.63]I'd usually be the type to be out too ooh
[01:44.66]But you ruined that for me
[01:46.72]So I don't want to go downtown
[01:49.43]Doin' what we used to
[01:51.28]Twist the top off another round hell I got enough loose screws
[01:55.20]I'm gettin' tired of hurting 'bout you
[01:57.39]Nothin' ever changes
[01:59.45]I think I'm gonna stay right here tonight
[02:01.38]'Cause that could be dangerous
[02:05.25]'Cause that could be dangerous
[02:10.10]Dangerous
[02:13.41]'Cause that could be dangerous
data.trans:
[ti:Dangerous]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.43]//
[00:06.87]//
[00:10.30]我可以看见我坐在一辆警车的后座上
[00:12.59]我的脑袋撞着车窗
[00:14.37]我可以看见我一口喝下最后一杯酒
[00:16.63]我掏空了钱包里的所有钱
[00:18.22]//
[00:20.29]这就是我为你买醉时的所做所为
[00:25.57]所以 我不想去市中心
[00:28.77]就像我们以前那样
[00:30.66]拧开瓶盖 再喝一轮 我已经喝到酩酊大醉
[00:34.61]我已经厌倦了让你伤心
[00:36.84]一成不变
[00:38.57]我想我今晚就待在这里
[00:40.77]因为我会身陷险境
[00:44.84]因为我会身陷险境
[00:50.02]我可以看见我和一位酷似Daisy Duke的美女打得火热
[00:53.20]可我明白这份情愫转瞬即逝
[00:54.79]我可以看见我在酒吧里点了太多酒
[00:57.19]让酒保为我倒上烈酒
[01:00.75]这是我想靠酒精忘记你时的所做所为
[01:05.95]所以 我不想去市中心
[01:09.06]就像我们以前那样
[01:10.91]拧开瓶盖 再喝一轮 我已经喝到酩酊大醉
[01:15.02]我已经厌倦了让你伤心
[01:17.12]一成不变
[01:18.94]我想我今晚就待在这里
[01:21.10]因为我会身陷险境
[01:25.11]因为我会身陷险境
[01:30.29]因为你
[01:32.70]你把别人耍得团团转
[01:36.63]你玩弄着老掉牙的把戏
[01:39.18]//
[01:40.63]我也是那种喜欢外出狂欢的人
[01:44.66]但是你让我不敢出去
[01:46.72]所以 我不想去市中心
[01:49.43]就像我们以前那样
[01:51.28]拧开瓶盖 再喝一轮 我已经喝到酩酊大醉
[01:55.20]我已经厌倦了让你伤心
[01:57.39]一成不变
[01:59.45]我想我今晚就待在这里
[02:01.38]因为我会身陷险境
[02:05.25]因为我会身陷险境
[02:10.10]危机四伏
[02:13.41]因为我会身陷险境
